name: FreeBSD/macOS/Linux - Overwrite file with DD
description:
Overwrites and deletes a file using DD.
To stop the test, break the command with CTRL/CMD+C.

data.command: dd of=#{file_to_overwrite} if=#{overwrite_source} count=$(ls -l #{file_to_overwrite} | awk '{print $5}') iflag=count_bytes

input_arguments.name: overwrite_source
input_arguments.description: Path of data source to overwrite with

input_arguments.name: file_to_overwrite
input_arguments.description: Path of file to overwrite and remove
